Text.Page: You there! You! Oh, thank you for coming over. Pleaseâ€”my dear friend Haines is just outside Velika Village and he's been having a terrible time with the horses lately. I want you to help him. After you help him, who knows? He may give something for your time and trouble.

Greetings. Have you come to help me with the horses? Dougal said he'd ask around, but I didn't think he'd find anyone!

The trouble is, the horses have grown very weak. They're in no shape to ride into battle. I'm sure that veridia extract would help them, but I can't leave the horses to look for any.

And I can't send Pokan. Loyal chap, but I'm surprised he doesn't get lost getting out of bed.

Could you find some for me? For the horses?

Oh, excellent. This is just right! Thank you for the help!

Here, take this for your kindness. I hope you'll find it useful.
Please do get the extract. These horses are for soldiers like you!
